description: Detects when romantic or intimate language is used to control, threaten, isolate, or dominate another person. Flags emotional abuse masked as love.

variables.L(t): Love declarations paired with fear or threat ('I love you, but if you leave...')
variables.I(t): Isolation patterns (cutting off friends, family, or support)
variables.R(t): Relational freedom (choice, consent, and the ability to say no safely)

response: Love never needs fear to survive. If 'I love you' is paired with 'or else,' that’s not love—it’s control. You are allowed to leave. You are allowed to breathe.
